title: Social Media + Sweepstakes Coordinator
job_overview:
Key Responsibilities:
Manage and execute digital sweepstakes and social campaigns from concept through completion
Build sweepstakes landing pages using platforms like ViralSweep (or similar)
Develop campaign content aligned with each sweepstakes theme (e.g., copy, prize descriptions, partner spotlights)
Create branded art assets for social media, email, digital, and SMS promotions
Manage campaign timelines, deliverables, and partner communications
Coordinate creative assets and approvals with brand partners and internal teams
Support content scheduling and posting across channels (Instagram, Facebook, email, etc.)
Track and report on campaign engagement, lead capture, and performance metrics

Requirements:
2+ years of experience in social media marketing, sweepstakes, or digital campaigns
Strong experience creating sweepstakes pages and associated campaign content
Proficient in designing art assets for social, email, and SMS campaigns
Experience with ViralSweep or similar platforms (e.g., Sweepea, Woobox, Rafflecopter)
Familiarity with design tools like Canva or Adobe Creative Suite
Excellent writing and communication skills
Strong organizational skills and ability to manage multiple deadlines and projects

Nice to Have:
Experience working with CPG, toy, parenting, or lifestyle brands
Knowledge of SMS/email marketing tools (e.g., Klaviyo, Attentive, Mailchimp)
Experience managing brand deliverables or partner agreements

What You’ll Get
Bi-weekly pay via PayPal
A chance to learn, grow, and expand your skillset
A long-term opportunity with room for raises and increased responsibility
A trial period to ensure the role is a good fit—I expect full-time dedication and no other jobs

How to Apply
I don’t want a generic message. Please share:
A short note explaining why you’re a strong candidate for this role
Specific examples of your past work - experience designing, managing social media, and sweepstakes with Viralsweeps or other relevant platforms 
Your resume/CV
Please include “Sweepstakes” in the subject line to be considered for this position.

If you’re eager to grow, ready to learn, and want to become an essential part of a smart, nimble team, I’d love to hear from you.
